setrunps

PURPOSE

initialize runps component of ps

SYNOPSIS

function [nobjects, ps]=setrunps(data, dind, ps)

DESCRIPTION 

 initialize runps component of ps

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

  • runmodel Given data set DIND, find the best instance of form SIND.

SOURCE CODE 

0001 function [nobjects, ps]=setrunps(data, dind, ps)
0002 
0003 % initialize runps component of ps
0004 
0005 if ~isfield(data, 'type')
0006   if size(data,2)==size(data,1)    && ~ps.featforce% similarity data
0007     ps.runps.type = 'sim';  
0008     nobjects = size(data,1);
0009   else
0010     ps.runps.type = 'feat';  
0011     nobjects=size(data,1);
0012   end
0013 else
0014     ps.runps.type = 'rel';  
0015     nobjects = data.nobj; 
0016     ps.speed = 5;           % 54 unnecessary for relational data
0017     ps.init = 'none';           % unnecessary to init search with tied
0018                    %         branch lengths
0019 end
0020 ps.runps.nobjects = nobjects;
0021 
0022 
0023 if strcmp(ps.runps.type, 'sim')    % similarity data
0024   % number of subjects in experiment
0025   ps.runps.dim = ps.simdim{dind};
0026 end
